ai-ya3.3.3:1.1_0: One whose sense-sphere will be born, ~ will become corrupted.
ai-ya3.3.3:2.1_0: But if he does so he who is able to completely understand the sense fields and he will completely understand that.
ai-ya3.3.3:3.1_0: One who doesn’t completely understand that sense-field does not die.
ai-ya3.3.3:4.1_0: But when there is no-one who doesn’t completely understand, he who does not completely understand what is lost.
